title: Florida Flummoxed, Tenet(flix) 7.24.20
itunes:title: Florida Flummoxed, Tenet(flix) 7.24.20
description:
In episode 679, Jack and Miles are joined by writer and Full Court Chat podcast host Dave Schilling to discuss Stephen Miller's grandmother passing from Covid-19, Joe Biden surging in the polls while Florida's governor Ron DeSantis is plunging for his Cover handling, a public health employee from Florida being fired after predicting their coronaries catastrophe, Kayleigh McEnany's explanation of Trump's well wishes for Ghislaine Maxwell, Christoper Nolan's Tenet being delayed, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Stephen Miller’s Grandmother Died of COVID-19. Her Son Blames the Trump Administration.
  2. Biden holds 13-point lead over Trump in Florida: poll
  3. DeSantis approval on handling of coronavirus plunges: poll
  4. A public health employee predicted Florida's coronavirus catastrophe — then she was fired: 'This is everything I was trying to warn people about'
  5. DOH Names Director for Division of Disease Control and Health Protection
  6. Transcript: Dr. Deborah Birx discusses coronavirus on "Face the Nation," April 19, 2020
  7. Kayleigh McEnany has a baffling explanation for why Trump offered well wishes to Ghislaine Maxwell
  8. Sorry, ‘Tenet’ is Not Skipping Theaters and Going Straight to Streaming 
  9. WATCH: New Young Pony Club - Get Lucky

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
